metadata.description: Create rich context for Python MCP server projects.
metadata.author: code-kiwi

context.prerequisites: Run base init first: run("init") This directive enhances .ai/ with MCP-specific patterns.

step.name: analyze_structure
step.action: Find and document: - Entry point (cli.py, main.py, __main__.py) - Server file (server.py, app.py) - Tools location (tools/, commands/) - Types location (types/, mcp_types/, models/) - Config location (config/, settings.py) - Tests location (tests/, test_*)

step.name: extract_tool_pattern
step.action:
Find BaseTool or similar base class. Document: - Required properties (name, description, inputSchema) - Required methods (execute) - Helper methods (createSuccessResult, createErrorResult) - How tools are registered with server
Create pattern file: .ai/patterns/tool.md
step.example_output:
# Tool Pattern
## Creating a New Tool
